Container.Name: Walkabout
Container.Overview:
Walkabout is a self-hosted flight deal monitoring system that tracks prices from Google Flights and alerts you to exceptional deals.
Features: - Monitor routes from your home airports - Statistical deal detection (z-score analysis) - Push notifications via ntfy or Discord - Trip planning with date flexibility - Server-rendered dashboard (no JavaScript required)
Requires a PostgreSQL database (use the official postgres:15 container).
Created by Jed Esposito. Also check out Facet - a self-hosted personal profile platform: https://github.com/jesposito/Facet
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: flight deals travel airfare price monitor google flights cheap flights airline deals trip planner notifications ntfy discord
Container.Requires: Requires a PostgreSQL 15+ database container. Create the database before starting Walkabout.

Config.Name: Public URL
Config.Description: Public URL for Walkabout. Used for notification links.

Config.Name: Scheduler Enabled
Config.Description: Enable automatic price scraping on schedule

Config.Name: Scrape Frequency (Hours)
Config.Description: How often to check prices (in hours)

Config.Name: Notifications - ntfy URL
Config.Description: Self-hosted ntfy server URL (e.g., http://ntfy:80). Leave empty if not using ntfy.

Config.Name: AI - Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: API key for AI-powered deal descriptions (optional)

Config.Name: Seats.aero API Key
Config.Description: API key for award flight tracking (optional)

Config.Name: Deal Detection - Z-Score Threshold
Config.Description: Statistical threshold for deal alerts. Lower = more selective. Recommended: -1.5 to -2.0

Config.Name: Deal Detection - Min History
Config.Description: Minimum price samples needed before deal detection activates
